pinyin: Ou1 zhou1 Zi4 you2 Mao4 yi4 Lian2 meng2

sentences.english: Alliance flight path between Booty Bay and Stormwind goes through a tree.
sentences.chinese: 聯盟從藏寶海灣到暴風城的飛行路線會穿越一棵樹。

sentences.english: The activities of Regional Alliances will conform to the Rules for Regional Alliances of ICOM National Committees.
sentences.chinese: 地區聯盟旳活動應遵守自身旳程序規則。

sentences.english: The Soyuz spacecraft appears at the bottom left.
sentences.chinese: 聯盟號宇宙飛船出現在圖片的左下方。

sentences.english: You are the steadiest of steady.
sentences.chinese: 你是聯盟裏最最穩定的球員。

sentences.english: An alliance with likeminded Red Talons may not be long in coming.
sentences.chinese: 有差不多意圖的聯盟部族比如紅爪不久也會這麼想。

sentences.english: entered into an advertising dalliance with Google, but this fell apart after antitrust authorities signalled that they would not approve such an agreement.
sentences.chinese: 但是因反托馬斯當局的不贊成，他們的聯盟落空。

sentences.english: Many of his records in the Negro League were never recorded.
sentences.chinese: 但他在聯盟中的許多記錄均未能記載下來。

sentences.english: The Mon Calamari are said to be the soul of the Rebel Alliance.
sentences.chinese: 蒙克萊梅利人常被稱爲是反抗軍聯盟的靈魂人物。

sentences.english: The historic rivalries of Ivy League universities in the United States have reached the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 美國常青藤聯盟大學的歷史性競爭演繹到了互聯網上。

sentences.english: He was the eighth Japanese-born pitcher to make his Major League debut as a starter.
sentences.chinese: 他是第八位日籍投手能在大聯盟裏先發的投手。

sentences.english: Italy's metal-workers' union calls goes on strike.
sentences.chinese: 意大利鋼鐵工人聯盟發起罷工。

sentences.english: Now financial firms recruit from the cream of the Ivy League.
sentences.chinese: 現在，金融公司招的都是長春藤聯盟的“三好學生”。

sentences.english: There are so many leapers in this league, so many basket attackers.
sentences.chinese: 聯盟裏現在有如此多的彈跳人和灌籃家。

sentences.english: In 1981, a seven - week - old Major League Baseball strike ended.
sentences.chinese: 1981年，美國職業棒球長達七週大聯盟罷工結束。

sentences.english: Also for her right-wing, pro-corporate alliance with US President Regan.
sentences.chinese: 還爲她右翼，有利於企業聯盟與美國總統里根。

sentences.english: Leagues are commonly made for mutual defense.
sentences.chinese: 結成聯盟往往是爲了共同防禦。

definition: to originate/to initiate/to launch (an attack, an initiative etc)/to start/to propose sth (for the first time)
club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]
Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
